definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 14:18 sun (NH id.)—abs. ´[[ח]] Job 9:7 (‖[[כוכבים]]); c. [[ה]] epenth. [[בְּטֶרֶם יׇבׂא הַחַ֫רְסָה]] Ju Jdg 14:18 (cf. [[לַיִל]], [[לַיְלָה]]) before the sun could go down (but rd. perh. [[הַחַ֫דְרָה]] into the (bridal) chamber Sta:ZAW 1884, 253 ff.).
